documentation.title: APIs & Services
documentation.subTitle: Access information on how to use Forge APIs and Services

cards.title: Authentication
cards.text: Generate tokens based on the OAuth 2.0 standard to authenticate requests made to Forge APIs and SDKs.

cards.title: BIM 360
cards.text: Integrate with the Autodesk BIM 360 platform to extend its capabilities to reach segments of the construction ecosystem that donâ€™t have direct access to BIM data.

cards.title: Data Management
cards.text: Access data across BIM 360 team, Fusion Team, BIM 360 Docs, and the Object Storage Service to build apps to display and extend your data in ways that add value to your users.

cards.title: Design Automation
cards.text: Automate repetitive tasks by leveraging on the scale of the Forge Platform and running scripts on your design files in the cloud.

cards.title: Model Derivative
cards.text: Derive outputs viewable by the Forge Viewer from more than 60 CAD file formats, and extract metadata about the models as well as the individual objects within the model.

cards.title: Reality Capture
cards.text: Convert digital images into high resolution textured meshes, dense point clouds and orthophotos.

cards.title: Token Flex
cards.text: Access Autodesk Token Flex Usage Data platform to generate reports on consumption, usage, and contract details.

cards.title: Viewer
cards.text: Render 3D and 2D model data within a browser. The models can come from a wide range of applications such as AutoCAD, Fusion 360, Revit, and many more.

cards.title: Webhooks
cards.text: Subscribe to and receive notifications of the occurrence of events within the Forge eco system.
